trans-unit.source: The QueryInterceptorAttribute on a method annotates it as a query interceptor on the specified entity set.
trans-unit.target: 方法 QueryInterceptorAttribute 批注它作为查询侦听器上指定的实体集。

trans-unit.source: Entity set-level authorization and validation is implemented by methods annotated with the QueryInterceptorAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 实体集级授权和验证由实现使用 QueryInterceptorAttribute 批注的方法。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]s do not implement security policies but instead provide the infrastructure required for service developers to write their own security rules and business validation.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]s 执行不实施安全策略，而是提供所需的服务开发人员编写自己的安全规则和业务验证的基础结构。

trans-unit.source: Entity set access control and validation is enabled through query operations by using query composition.
trans-unit.target: 实体集的访问控制和验证通过查询操作使用的查询组合。

trans-unit.source: To control entity-based access, implement a method-per-entity set according to the following rules: The method must have public scope and be annotated with the QueryInterceptorAttribute, taking the name of a entity set as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制基于实体的访问，实现方法每个实体设置根据下列规则︰ 该方法必须具有公共作用域，并使用 QueryInterceptorAttribute，采用的实体集作为参数的名称添加批注。

trans-unit.source: The method must accept no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须接受任何参数。

trans-unit.source: The method must return an expression of type `Expression<Func<T, bool>>` that is the filter to be composed for the entity set.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须返回类型的表达式`Expression<Func<T, bool>>`，它是筛选器的实体集由组成。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class for the entity set specified by the entitySetName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例由指定的实体集的类 entitySetName 参数。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity set that contains the entity to which the interceptor applies.
trans-unit.target: 包含要应用拦截器实体的实体集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the entity set that contains the entity to which the interceptor applies.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含要应用拦截器实体的实体集的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the name of the entity set that contains the entity to which the interceptor applies.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指示包含要应用拦截器实体的实体集的名称。
